User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; PPC Mac OS X 10.4; en-US; rv:1.9.1.16) Gecko/20101123 SeaMonkey/2.0.11
Build Identifier: 

I am trying to show enhancement request for ticks or scale with line number in tab for long window displays

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.this is a request
2.
3.
Actual Results:  
enhancement request for ticks or scale with line number in tab for long window displays

Expected Results:  
long window enhancement request for ticks or scale with line number in tab for long window displays so as you read a long window you can mentally note that at line 35 and at line 84 and so on are items I want to take note of -- this is a requested added feature that may be miss placed - the learning curve is very steep with all you teckies hope your not mad at me.

enhancement request for ticks or scale with line number in tab for long window displays in right hand of web page with number 00 to 99 should work just fine this would assist in locating an item in a long web page like a legal brief. It is just an idea that could be an enhancement.

I do not see how to make the request -- it is too hard to find so here it is, hope your not all mad at me for doing it this way.
comments.creator: billneill@yahoo.com
